attributes.action: bring Margaret Thatcher and Geoffrey Lawson to account for masterminding an artificially created boom which caused several hundred thousand families to have their homes repossessed a few years later.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The late Eighties boom was created by deliberately taking political control of interest rates, lowering them and relaxing credit contols.
The bust and recession which followed had dire consequences for many families and individuals, who lost their homes in the years after.
There ought to be some sort of apology at least, for the suffering caused.

rejection.details: You may wish to rethink your naming of Geoffrey Lawson
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
